name: Surathli
relicBonuses: At the start of battle, the bearer gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_SHELL}.
At the start of its bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
After the bearer takes damage from an attack or spell, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Healing on it.
This relic has a 10% chance to prevent damage dealt to its bearer.
After the bearer deals damage with an attack or spell, it gains a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} equal to 5% of the damage dealt.
The first time the bearer dies in battle, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Major Resurrection on it.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks} or {ACTION_casts} a spell, it gives its bearer {CONDNAME_BUFF_SHELL}.
At the end of its bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Holy Explosion.
title: Goddess of Light
